mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_VOLUNTEER (ID, VOLUNTEER_START_DATE, VOLUNTEER_END_DATE, VOLUNTEER_DEADLINE) VALUES (#{id}, TO_DATE(#{volunteerStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{volunteerEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{volunteerDeadline}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_VOLUNTEER SET VOLUNTEER_START_DATE = TO_DATE(#{volunteerStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), VOLUNTEER_END_DATE = TO_DATE(#{volunteerEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), VOLUNTEER_DEADLINE = TO_DATE(#{volunteerDeadline}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ID = #{id}
